name: The Futanari Princess
description:
The Futanari Princess is a video game adaptation of a novella I wrote last year. It follows Auriel, a princess betrothed to a prince she's never met. With no other children, Auriel is her kingdom's only hope of a peaceful succession to another nation when her father dies. 

The only problem for Auriel is that she is a lesbian and does not want to marry a man. Desperately in love with her lady-in-waiting, she pushes down her feelings in order to do her duty to her parents and country. 

If you want to support the development of this game and have a direct impact of the direction, consider becoming a patron by following this link. Patrons have access to new builds of the game one month before I post them here.

Story themes: Yuri, Futanari, Gender Swap, BDSM, Romance.

Planned Game Features

  • Reverse Harem starring a Futanari Princess (Spoiler, Auriel turns into a futanari partway through the game)
  • Narrative Sex with Artwork with decision trees - Future update with different artwork based on your choices during sex
  • Old School RPG with a Futanari twist
  • Fantasy Races
  • Epic Story sweeping across the world
  • Fleshed out Main party and Side Characters

Current State - V 0.1
The prologue is playable, but bust artwork and H Scenes are still in development for the prologue.
